overview: Documentary - American music greats The Fabulous Thunderbirds take the stage with their own inimitable blend of R&B and rock 'n' roll for a powerhouse performance covering more than 20 years of hits! Recorded live in Los Angeles, this solid set of smoldering songs includes "Wait on Time," "My Babe," "The Things I Used to Do," "The Hustle Is On," "I Can Tell," "Look Whatcha Done," "Wrap It Up" and "Early Every Morning," among others. -  Kim Wilson, Kid Ramos, Willy Campbell
title: Fabulous Thunderbirds: Invitation Only
